name: Parcel Management System
overview: A comprehensive MERN stack application for parcel booking, delivery management, and user interactions.
installation: Clone repositories, set up environment variables, install dependencies, and run development servers.

name: Product Recommendation Platform
overview: A platform for product queries and recommendations, with CRUD operations, authentication, and dynamic layout.
installation: Clone repositories, set up environment variables, install dependencies, and run the development servers.

name: EquiSports: Sports Equipment Online Store
overview: An online store for sports equipment with user authentication, CRUD operations, theme toggle, and interactive UI components.
installation: Clone the repository, set up environment variables, install dependencies, and run the project.

name: GadgetHaven - E-commerce Platform
overview: A modern e-commerce platform with features such as product filtering, cart and wishlist management, and a responsive design.
installation: Clone the repository, install dependencies, and run the development server.
